value.desc: An array of IDs which is the order of your rows. This should be used with v-model.

depthMap.desc: An object that maps id's to the prop names and an integer representing the depth of each row to the prop values. If every ID has a depth of 0 then the list is flat. Whenever there is an ID with a higher integer (eg. 1) it is considered a child row to the row above it and will appear indented.

default.desc: The only direct child should be a QDraggableRow with a v-for to represent your rows.
